content: this is a great stash buster all you need is any yarn that you have on hand if you want the scarf to be drapey go up 2 or more hook sizes than the hook or needle size suggested on the ball band if you crochet loosely you might not need to if you crochet tightly like me you do example was made with frog tree pima cotton silk j / 6 0 mm hook approx 58 long and 3 wide gauge 12 row in 2 / 4 - single_crochet ch1 in 2 i did 17 row for my scarf this pattern is also listed online with how to links for new crocheters
